Content: I'm learning English and it is helping me about pronunciation listening American speaker. the app is easy to use, doesn't crash in my mobile Asus, it works perfectly for all day while I'm at work
Simple and fast, I liked it, but... the app crash all the time. What is the use of a Radio app if it stop to play all the time? Fix it, please.

UPDATE Was Fast 'n smooth
UPDATE..AUG 2016 CUTS OFF TALK & MUSIC TO LOAD ADS. AT TIMES, AN AD FREEZES THE APP. I used Tunein Pro for over a year and put up with ads, slow start ups and dozens of stops at the worse times during news and talk shows. Radio US loads very fast and saves battery life because no ads run like they did on Tunein constantly. After a week, not a single stop.
So far so good Other apps crash. All I want is to listen to fox news from nz. It ain't crashed yet so thumbs up
This app radio Keeps stopping and crashing often. Make it stop.
